name: long_qdec_table
description: Tool to operate on longitudinal QDEC tables.

inputs.name: QDEC Table
inputs.description: QDEC table file specifying the subjects and time points

inputs.name: Split Column
inputs.description: Split table based on column (e.g., use 'fsid-base' to separate subjects)

inputs.name: Cross Table Flag
inputs.description: Collapse table to cross sectional (one line per subject)

inputs.name: Sort Column
inputs.description: Sort table based on column within subject (e.g., 'age')

inputs.name: Output File Name
inputs.description: Output file name for operations producing a single table

output-files.name: Output Table
output-files.description: Output table file generated by the specified operations

author: FreeSurfer Developers
